The data flashes up screen by screen as you analyze it. The solar plant seems to use a series of mirrors to focus sunlight on a central element, heating it up to a formidable temperature in order to create electrical energy. It's an unconventional but effective way of generating power so long as you can deploy the mirror.

The data scrolls by steadily. Blueprints for a device that's perhaps euphemistically named specimen containment. It uses a form of suspended animation to sustain and contain alien lifeforms inside a suspension capsule. It also comes with a form of teleportation relay link that may be utilized to transfer a lifeform to the capsule without inconvenience.

The images linked to this design seem to briefly make you worried you've found the death star plans. But no this device is much smaller, handheld, and apparently a teleportation device used to teleport the target to a linked teleportation relay. It probably takes quite a while to lock on so you wouldn't be able to use it as a weapon in combat. It's also useless without a teleportation relay to act as its target, but with it you can probably get some good use out of this.
